Package com.fluidops.iwb.server

various services / servlets for exporting CSV, PDF, search, etc.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractFileServlet Base class for FileServlet and UserFileServlet defining the common behaviour.
FileServlet FileServlet allows to access and download files from the browser
HybridSearchServlet Hybrid search servlet combining structured and unstructured queries.
HybridSearchServlet.BooleanQueryResult  
IWBHttpServlet Base class for any HTTP Servlet in the Information Workbench.
IwbServletContextListener Initializer for IWB (CE) on application startup/deployment (needs to be registered as in web.xml)
PDFServlet PDF export of a page
RDFServlet bootstrap export data as RDF/XML
RedirectService Class generating common redirect URLs, e.g. generating redirects to AccessForbidden and PageNotFound URLs.
Servlet simplified wiki servlet workflow
SparqlServlet New SPARQL Servlet architecture that is standard conform to the SPARQL specification.
UploadServlet update datastore with uploaded content
UserFileServlet Servlet to
 

Enum Summary
AbstractFileServlet.RootDirectory  
RedirectService.RedirectType Mapping from redirect strings to Wiki templates
